summary: Behold the power of Nocte Matrem, the wife of Sithis!
descriptionHtml:
Well, if you don't get the joke, then join [url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/ElderScrolls.Series]this group[/url]. You'll get it as soon as your membership is accepted (or not).

NOTE: This mod is unbalanced, and just for fun. Do not take it seriously. It is not lore-friendly, and requires Dragonborn.

To get the hammer, open up your console and type [b][i]player.additem XX0036C9[/b][/i] (the ID may vary depending on your load order). Alternatively, you can type [b][i]help nocte[/b][/i] on your console and get the hammer's ID.


[center][b][i]Other mods of mine[/i]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40849][color=#d3d3d3]Domus Imperatoris[/color][/url][color=#d3d3d3] | [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48764][color=#d3d3d3]Mining Guild[/color][/url][color=#d3d3d3] | [/color][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41567][color=#d3d3d3]Zumul Thu'um[/color][/url][/b][/center]
author: thaalesalves
